name: Cards and pair - Matchismo
description:
Mind the playing cards by opening each one and try to make a pair of them by card type or card number. There is a point system as well where you will get 16 and 4 points respectively. If you fail to match card, then you will penalty of 2 points. Favorite game by the university.

PLAYING CARD GAME
- Match card by opening random or remember the card.
- Get 16 points, if you matched with the same number.
- Get 4 points, If you matched with the same card type.
- The wrong match will penalty 2 points.

BLOCK PAIR GAME
- Match your pairs by click on any appropriate blocks.
- You need to match here 3 pairs: 2 with empty pairs and 1 with a filled pair.
- Get 16 points on success matched
- As usual, The wrong match will penalty 2 points.

ADVANCE
- See your result of all the played games so far.
- Reset the game when you tired or finish the ​game.

Feel free to contact us on mayihelpu4app@gmail.com for any query.
